Subskills.name: Sharp Winds
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Wounding Spin
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Sharpened Blades
Subskills.description: Greatly increases area of effect radius dealing increased damage at the outer edge.

Subskills.name: Deadly Blow
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Typhoon
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Airborne Debris
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike chance when using whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Cycloning Step
Subskills.description: Increases your movement speed while using whirlwind.

Subskills.name: Second Wind
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to unleash a twister.

Subskills.name: Airborne
Subskills.description: Knock monsters high into air causing them to take increased damage upon landing.

Subskills.name: Burning Air
Subskills.description: Convert a portion of your damage to fire damage.

Subskills.name: Trail of Fire
Subskills.description: Leave a trail of fire behind you inflicting monsters with burning.

Subskills.name: Scorching Heat
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Detonation
Subskills.description: Store damage dealt to monsters unleashing it when whirlwind ends dealing damage on a large radius around you.

Subskills.name: Negative Pressure
Subskills.description: monsters at the edge of the whirlwind radius are sucked within the whirlwind.
